meanings.definition: To like (one thing or person) better than another or others; tend to choose.
meanings.sent1: She always prefers vanilla ice cream over chocolate.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to read books rather than watch TV.
meanings.sent3: He prefers to wear his socks outside his shoes for fun.
meanings.sent4: The cat prefers to nap in the sunbeam like a king on his throne.
meanings.sent5: My sister prefers to study with music playing softly in the background.

meanings.definition: To give priority or precedence to (a creditor).
meanings.sent1: The company is preferring to pay off its debts before investing in new projects.
meanings.sent2: The bank is preferring to settle the outstanding loans first.
meanings.sent3: The business owner prefers to juggle debts like a skilled circus performer.
meanings.sent4: The debts loomed over him, preferring to cast a shadow on his financial future.
meanings.sent5: The creditor prefers to be at the top of the repayment list to ensure timely payments.
